name: Unmooring
flavor: Your weapon unleashes psionic energy that reduces your target's weight.

metadata.flavor: Your weapon unleashes psionic energy that reduces your target's weight.

effects.roll: Power Roll + Might, Reason, Intuition, or Presence
effects.tier1: 5 + M, R, I, or P damage
effects.tier2: 8 + M, R, I, or P damage
effects.tier3: 11 + M, R, I, or P damage

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the end of the target's next turn, any forced movement that affects the target has its distance increased by 2.
